ComicInfo.Penciller: Alan Moore,Charles Vess,Keith Giffen,Paul Chadwick,Rick Geary,Ron Randall,Steve Bissette,Steve Bissette,Ron Randall
ComicInfo.Series: Godzilla, King of the Monsters Special
ComicInfo.Summary:
The BIGGEST character of all time is back--like you've never seen him before! Plus, beginning in this issue, a series of full page pin-ups by Giffen, Moore, Vess, Vietch, Yeates, Gulacy, Chadwick, Warner, Eastman & Laird, Salmons and others!
General Notes
Not all the artists mentioned in the solicit had their pin-ups published in this issue although several of them did including Alan Moore (who is much better known for his writing).
ComicInfo.Title: untitled
